knimeNode.name: Leaflet Map View
knimeNode.shortDescription: A node which creates a Leaflet view using Javascript.

intro.p: This node displays the given GeoJson data as an interactive map view.

The node supports custom CSS styling. You can simply put CSS rules into a single string and set it as a flow variable 'customCSS' in the node configuration dialog. You will find the list of available classes and their description on our documentation page .

tab.name: Options
tab.option: A column whose values will be used as the labels for the heatmap's rows. By default, the row IDs are used as labels.

tab.name: View Configuration
tab.option: The width, in pixels, of the output SVG image. If "Resize view to fill window" is not selected, this is also the static width of the view.

tab.name: Interactivity
tab.option: If checked all edit controls selected below will be rendered in the view. Unchecking this option disables all edit controls.

knimeNode.interactiveView: A Leaflet map view representation of the input data table.

ports.outPort: An SVG image representation of the view.
